submapp.som.Som.class2weights¶

Som.class2weights(classes: numpy.ndarray = None) → numpy.ndarray¶

Matrix of referent vectors associated to the given classes

class2weights[k] is the k``th weights (referent vector) of the SOM (``k in [|0, n*m - 1|] (``k``th class)

Parameters

classes (np.ndarray[int], optional) – Vector of classes corresponding to the referent vectors wanted. Defaults to None, in this case all referent vectors (associated to all classes, from 0 to nb_classes-1) will be returned.

Returns

A matrix containing all the referent vectors corresponding to the classes given.

Return type

np.ndarray[float], shape = (len(classes), p)
